resources.string:
1. Point the smartphone IR transmitter towards the incubator.
2. Click the "-" or "+" button to enter the temperature change mode (the incubator display should blink).
3. Use the -/+ buttons to set the desired temperature.
4. Wait a moment until the display stops flashing.

In cases when the incubator does not respond to the buttons -/+, change the frequency in the menu -> IrDA frequency.
